title: address
description: An address in SK must always be related to an object.

city.description: City for the address. Must at least be present for an address.

address1.description: Should contain the street or otherwise primary address information.

address2.description: Additional address information, like floor number

zip.description: Zip number of the city. Length must be between 4..10

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

address_type.description: Type of the address, as seen by vCard definition.
